summary: Implements a deprecated diffusion pipeline that generates audio spectrograms by encoding continuous and note representations, decoding them with a T5-based model, and iteratively denoising using a DDPMScheduler, with support for optional ONNX acceleration and post‑processing to audio waveforms.
business_intent: Enable developers to synthesize high‑quality audio or music from textual or symbolic inputs using diffusion models, streamlining integration of advanced audio generation capabilities into creative, entertainment, or speech‑related applications.
